game.name: Man in gravity
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A runner in which the player is able to control the force of gravity (change the gravity up and down). The goal of the player is to run as far as possible, and preferably get a better result than other players
game.shortDescriptionEn: A runner in which the player is able to control the force of gravity (change the gravity up and down). The goal of the player is to run as far as possible, and preferably get a better result than other players
